overview: For Lauren Daniels, life is good. She is happily married to her husband, Tommy, whom she watches excel in the practice of law. But, after learning about his casual fling with his alluring assistant, Cassandra, everything changes. Triggered by Tommy's deceitful actions, Lauren's emotions become unstable and her behavior escalates from bitterness to pure rage. Her plan is to get rid of Tommy, whom she blames for ruining her life. Her scheme takes a dramatic turn when she comes face to face with the killer.
title: Deception
